transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello? Haan Yogesh sir namaskar.
Customer: Namaste boliye.
Executive: Kaise hain sir?
Customer: Badhiya badhiya aap bataye.
Executive: Ji sir waha se na matlab waha se reply aa gaya team se aage se.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To wo log kya keh rahe hain ki unhone aapka pura jitne bhi notifications aapko share kiye gaye hain na.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Uska pura unhone score card bana ke bhej bhi diya hai mere paas. Thik hai to unhone unhone kya bola hai ki notification deliver hote hain. Thik hai aur notification har lead ke deliver nahi hote sir. Jitni bhi leads aati hain ek din mein lagbhag uh mean agar hum ek average account ki baat karein to ek din mein lagbhag lagbhag bahut sari leads aati hain iska notification bhejna impossible hai client bhi pareshan ho jayega itni leads aati hain thik hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To lekin jo aapke priority based products hain thik hai hum log jyada unki leads bhejte hain ki jo aapke consuming pattern mein a rank hote hain ya fir bahut achcha aap isme interest dikhate ho to sirf uske hi notification jaate hain sir. Thik hai starting mein jaise aap bol rahe the na ki mere ko sare notification aate the jab aapka consuming behavior na ban raha tha aur jab aap MDC mein the na sir to jyada responsive the jyada aap active rehte the abhi TrustSeal mein aate hi aapko to aap thoda sa kam active rehte hain aur unhone jo notification aaye jaise maan ke chalo aapko 223 notification gaye ye MDC wale time ka hai ye 241 notification gaye the to aapne 233 notifications pe click kiya tha aur usme interest show kiya tha.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Lekin abhi kya hai sir hai na abhi kya hai ki sir jaise maan ke chalo aapke paas 247 notifications aa rahe hain to aap 45 notifications pe hi interest show karte hain to aapka jo ratio hai na wo 17.9% ban raha hai fir uske baad agle mahine mein 22 notification gaye matlab 136 gaye fir aapne usme se 22 hi open kiye fir abhi current month mein dekhe to 239 notifications gaye to usme se 48 notifications pe hi aapne click kiya 90 19.8 ka ye aapka opening status hai. Thik hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan to yahi hai sir ki matlab thoda sa na jaise aapke paas agar koi notification aa raha hai to usko thoda sa matlab yahi hai ki kul mila ke profile pe thoda sa active rehna padega wo jaise maine aapko bataya tha na ek usme laptop mein ya kuch usme login karke aap is cheez ko na tackle kar sakte ho aaram se agar ek ye do teen buyleads agar aapne notification ke sath uski auto wali uski segment ki consume kar li na to wo aapki priority based mein ho jayega to aapko notification bhi uska bahut priority basis pe aane lag jayega sir.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Baki pura sir maine dekhiye meri baat pe vishwas kijiyega sir.
Customer: Abhi aaj mein nahi aaj mein mujhe change dikha kyuki do buylead mujhe deliver hui hai notification pe dono maine consume ki hai. Thik hai.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Hua bhi hai abhi kaisa hota hai na ki hum yaha pe busy rehte hain humne koi IndiaMART ke liye alag se ladka lagaya nahi hai.
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Customer: Haan baki aap meri baat pe vishwas kijiyega Yogesh ji maine bahut koshish ki cheezon ko tackle karne ki aur matlab har jis bhi possible department mein mere ko is issue ko forward karna tha sare departments mein bhi follow kiya matlab issue ko bheja fir pehle starting mein mere ko bhi itni wo nahi thi par lekin unhone with proof sari cheeze mere ko bheji to mere ko bhi yakeen hua hai ki haan hamari taraf se koi aisi technical glitch nahi hai thik hai thoda sa competition bhi aap bhi samajhte ho sir time ke hisab se competition bhi raise hota hai ya fir competition raise nahi hota to jo purane aapke customers the hai na matlab aapke competitors the wo upgrade kar aa rahe hain matlab badi badi services mein hai na to ye ye cheeze hui hai ki sir matlab aur customer base bhi sir aapko pata hi hai badhta hi badhta hai time ke hisab se 2016 mein aur 2025 mein 2019 mein aur 2025 mein bahut fark aa jata hai sir.
Customer: Haan haan haan haan hai na to usme koi dikkat nahi hai is cheez ka aap nishchint rahiye isme aap ye maan lijiye sir ki ye issue jo hai na isse pehle resolve jo hua hai isse pehle aapka issue nahi tha ye mera issue tha main aap pehle apna issue leke chal raha tha ki mera issue hai main is issue ko solve karaunga lekin hamari maine sari team se jitna bhi mail kiya jitna bhi loop chalaya sir koi dikkat nahi nikli sab kuch sahi hai bas thoda sa aapka response rate jo hai na wo thoda kam nikal ke aaya tha unhone pura iska score card bhi bheja hai mere ko thik hai thoda sa yahi kijiye sir ki thoda sa agar jyada competitive product hai usme competitors jyada active hain jyada achcha business milta hai hai na to usme thoda sa koshish kiya kijiye ki uska koi wo buylead bhi miss na kiya karo aap usko search karo apni buyleads mein aake hai na aur waha se consume karo koi notification aaye turant us pe click karo apne aap jaise aap is pe active rahoge na turant apne aap hi profile aapko push karne lag jayegi hamara platform hi aapko push karne lag jayega aage.
Customer: Abhi 15 din to main try karta hu ye.
Executive: Nahi aap befikar rahiye sir dekhiye aapko bhi pata hai sir IndiaMART koi aisi koi company nahi hai registered company hai hai na IPO registered company hai to wo aisa to itne itni badi wo ye nahi karegi ki bhai aap se jyada paisa leke aap se kam paise wali service mein jyada business de samajh rahe ho ye aapko bhi pata hai ye bhi logic hai hai na ye bhi logic hai ke aisa nahi hai koi bhi company aisa nahi karegi ki chhote apne users ko jyada business de aur bade user ko kam business de to koi possibility nahi hai cheeze sari thik hain aur thoda sa positive hoke sir service ko dobara se start kijiye proper tarika se dekhiye thik hai aur koi bhi dikkat aati hai to sir main hu hi aapke paas kabhi bhi call kijiye sir mera number to save hi hai aapke paas ya nahi hai save?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Nahi nahi hai.
Customer: Number save?
Executive: Number save hai?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Haan chalo badhiya hai sir fir main ye close kar raha hu yaha se concern hai na.
Customer: Thik hai fir dekhte hain hum.
Executive: Sir ye wo ticket open ho gaya tha mere paas.
Executive: Are aap bilkul fikr mat kijiye aap active rahenge na aapka jaise hi consuming pattern ban jayega aap sari cheeze thik ho jayengi sir dekhne wali koi isme baat hi nahi hai bilkul transparency ke sath main aapko bata raha hu aur aap bhi is cheez ko aage jaake notice karenge.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Hello okay.
Customer: Haan haan ek minute main call karta hu aapko thik hai.
Executive: To fir aap ye main band kar de raha hu mail thread jo hai sir hai na.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer was not receiving buylead notifications.



Resolution:

- Executive explained notification delivery process.

- Executive shared customer's notification click-through rate.

- Executive advised to be more active on profile.

- Executive assured issue was resolved.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will try the suggested steps for 15 days.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, notifications, trustseal, mdc, profile activity
